text: Tɨkatɨka kuyundu mirɨmba naŋga Farisi narɨ, narɨ pɨmɨ aru kavɨrɨmandɨra. Narɨ kuyusɨhɨrɨmbɨhapɨha ŋɨnɨŋ. Narɨ maki naŋga kuku kuvɨrahuvɨra vuŋgɨ haŋɨnɨŋ kutɨhambu taya ñaŋɨrandamandara. Hara ñaña hɨm kandɨhañɨ kundandara haŋɨnɨŋ kipa mɨŋamɨŋa vana, naŋga narɨŋambirɨmɨndaya indarɨtarɨ vanayɨ mɨŋandara.
